item.title: PARA
item.description: score:15 Chances: Paramount Global’s decision not to sell the majority stake of BET Media Group indicates their strategic focus on maintaining value. The consideration of ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) factors in content creation and delivery can be a positive aspect for the company.
